entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of drizzle late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
